items.question: Is the application free?
items.answer: Yes, the application is completely free for personal use

items.question: Is an internet connection required?
items.answer: No, you can use the desktop version without internet connection. The web version requires connection

items.question: How is my data protected?
items.answer: Data is encrypted and protected. In the desktop version, it's stored locally on your computer

items.question: Can I import existing data?
items.answer: Yes, the system supports importing data from Excel and CSV files
